translations.Your client is not authorized to connect: Mteja wako hajaidhinishwa kuunganisha. Tafadhali mjulishe msimamizi wa mteja wako.
translations.Your redirect URL needs to be a full URL: URL yako ya kuelekeza kwingine inahitaji kuwa URL kamili kwa mfano: https://yourdomain.com/path
translations.Allows OAuth2 compatible authentication: Huruhusu uthibitishaji tangamanifu wa OAuth2 kutoka kwa programu zingine za wavuti.
translations.The OAuth2 app allows administrators to: Programu ya OAuth2 huruhusu wasimamizi kusanidi utendakazi wa uthibitishaji uliojengewa ndani ili kuruhusu pia uthibitishaji unaooana na OAuth2 kutoka kwa programu zingine za wavuti.
translations.OAuth 2.0 allows external services to re: OAuth 2.0 inaruhusu huduma za nje kuomba ufikiaji {instanceName}.
translations.Name: Jina
translations.Make sure you store the secret key, it c: Hakikisha umehifadhi ufunguo wa siri, hauwezi kurejeshwa.
